text: Happiness is a 1998 American comedy drama movie. It stars Jane Adams, Jon Lovitz, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Dylan Baker and Lara Flynn Boyle. It was directed by Todd Solondz. The movie was first rated NC-17. This caused problems with the advertising and distribution of the movie. Because of this, they chose to release the movie without any rating. The movie was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for "Best Screenplay" (Todd Solondz). == Other websites == * Category:1998 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about suburbia Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Multilingual movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about pedophilia Category:Movies about child sexual abuse Category:1998 independent movies
title: Happiness (movie)
